thread.title: Hawks, fans celebrate AFL cup threepeat
thread.title_full: Hawks, fans celebrate AFL cup threepeat

author: AAP
title: Hawks, fans celebrate AFL cup threepeat
text:
Hawks, fans celebrate AFL cup threepeat   1:04 pm AFL GRAND FINAL OFFER! If your team leads at any break but loses, CASH BACK up to $100!* PLUS Sign up now for a $501 Bonus Bet! Hawks, fans celebrate AFL cup threepeat 
The Hawksâ€™ players and legion of AFL fans should be well practised, by now, on shaking off a premiership celebration hang-over. 
The club on Saturday won their third title in as many seasons, and the fourth in eight years, triggering a late-night party that would feel like an annual get-together. 
Many fans will be back at the Melbourne Cricket Ground from 10am on Sunday, as the gates are thrown open for a day of kick-to-kick on the historic ground and photos with a replica premiership cup. 
The Hawthorn players will present the real thing to thousands of supporters at Glenferrie Oval, in Hawthorn, from midday on Sunday. 
They will also take the premiership cup to Tasmania, a club sponsor, on Wednesday to show it off at community events in Devonport, Launceston and Hobart.
